Name: Be Quiet!
About the game: 2007, your name is David and you woke up in the middle of nowhere, the only thing you can see in the forest is a house. Solve various puzzles to get to the next rooms and accomplish objectives! But watchout, you are not alone! Features: - Objective System - Jump scares (of course) - Story system - Stealth system - Multiple acts - Restore power to hide from the darkness
